Desc.entry: A voluntary, user-led drama group which aims to promote intercultural understanding, integration and cohesion between people of all ethnic cultural, faith and social backgrounds whilst raising awareness about the issues facing refugees and asylum seekers and the positive contributions they can make. Uses drama as a toll for building confidence, developing self expression and building friendships as well as exploring themes that are important and relevant to our members. The management committee of Side by Side is predominantly made up of refugees.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues 10.30am-1.30pm (drama workshop) please contact before attending
